text: Allaha uttama bani tatha kitaba nayila karechena, ya samanjasyapurna, punah punah pathita. Ete tadera loma kamta diye uthe camarara upara, yara tadera palanakartake bhaya kare, erapara tadera camara o antara allahara smarane binamra haya. Eta'i allahara patha nirdesa, era madhyame allaha yake iccha patha pradarsana karena. Ara allaha yake gomaraha karena, tara kona pathapradarsaka ne'i.
